sentences.sContent: He read it loudly, his hands on his ears, in a passionate voice, following a liturgical rhythm.
sentences.sContent_eng: He read it loudly, his hands on his ears, in a passionate voice, following a liturgical rhythm.
sentences.sCn: 他按照礼拜仪式的韵律，手捂着耳朵，以充满激情的声音大声地朗读起来。

sentences.sContent: He not only cares about us but has set up precise moral norms and liturgical practices that we must follow to ensure our eternal salvation.
sentences.sContent_eng: He not only cares about us but has set up precise moral norms and liturgical practices that we must follow to ensure our eternal salvation.
sentences.sCn: 他不但关心我们，而且设立了严格的道德规范和礼仪习俗，我们都必须加以遵守以确保获得永生的救赎。

sentences.sContent: He had many religious books, the kind of standard liturgical texts that were the stuff of religious enthusiasm, and more modern theological works in the Russian Orthodox tradition.
sentences.sContent_eng: He had many religious books, the kind of standard liturgical texts that were the stuff of religious enthusiasm, and more modern theological works in the Russian Orthodox tradition.
sentences.sCn: 他有许多宗教书籍 大多是关于标准的礼拜仪式的,也就是一些宗教狂热的东西,还有一些俄国东正教传统中更现代的神学作品

words.tran: 礼拜仪式；圣餐仪式；祷告文

trans.tranOther: relating to church services and ceremonies
